name: Halal Housing - A Scheme for the Faithful
tagline: Are you dreaming to own a house without going for a Bank Loan?
body:
Bismillahir Rahmaanir Raheem - _In the Name of Allah the Most Beneficent, The Most Merciful_!! ## About Us If there is a will there are multiple ways. Owning a decent flat in metropolitan cities of India through Halal means is no longer a distant dream. After so many years of patient waiting, contemplation and ground work, we are finally able to arrive at launching housing projects under the banner of **Halal Housing** - a novel housing scheme for the truly faithful. It is a hard reality that many of our brothers and sisters are still not in a position to have a own house in spite of a decent earning for the simple reason that they don’t want to go against the tenets of Islam by taking a conventional home loan from a Bank and fall into the traps of paying interest for the rest of their lives. **Halal Housing** is the result of their patient waiting and putting their complete trust in Allah. _Alhamdulillah_, under this scheme we have already completed one project in Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore and we are just starting our next project in the same vicinity but in a much bigger area. Our mission is to create more and more such projects, that will make housing affordable, simple and enjoyable. Here is the gist of this novel scheme - Pay a minimum of 35% upfront of the total cost and balance in maximum 36 EMI’s (Interest FREE) which is _Three Years_. For example, if the total cost of a flat is 30 lakhs, then you pay 10.5 lakhs (35%) minimum upfront payment and the balance 19.5 lakhs in maximum 36 EMI’s of approximately **Rs.55,000/-** each. We are sure this sounds very attractive and irresistible, _Alhamdulillah_. ## Project Summary Summary | Details ------------ | ------------- Project Name | **Dar-e-Salaam**, second project under the Halal Housing Scheme Location | Central Excise Layout, Dodda Kammanahalli, Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore No. of Flats | 13 flats, Car Parking in the Stilt, 3 flats per floor * four floors. One Pent house on top Avg. Area per Flat | Around 1200 SFT Spacious Flat with ample lighting and ventilation Architects | [Enif Designs](http://www.enifdesigns.com/), Bangalore, a young and vibrant Architectural Firm with a track record of designing some award winning projects Land Details | Measuring a total of around 4000 SFT (66 Ft X 60 Ft), Owned by two Sisters both of them are doctors, "A" Kaatha Property with very clear titles Project Timelines | Start from 1st of May 2016 and estimated to be completed within 15 months. Possession in the month of September 2017, _in shaa Allah_. ## Location The location of **Dar-e-Salaam** is Central Excise Layout, Dodda Kammanahalli (Less than a km from Bannerghatta Road) with close proximity to major business establishments, hospitals, schools and IT companies. The place is ideal for living as it is a very decent locality with many big apartments. At a distance of hardly half a kilometer from the project site is **Madheena Masjid**. Some of the big projects within few hundred meters are Century Paradise, Subodhya Laurals, Amada WalMark, Raja Aristos, etc. The exact coordinate (Lat/Long), **12°51'41.6"N 77°36'10.8"E**.
Exact distance from… * Jayadeva Hospital – 7.0 Kms * Royal Meenakshi Mall – 2.3 Kms * Electronics City – 12.0 Kms * T John College (NICE Road) – 2.9 Kms * Mantri Pinnacle (Tallest Residential Tower in S.India) – 1.0 Km Site visit can be arranged for brothers / sisters who want to come and see the place before making a flat booking. Please get in touch with one of our representatives through email halalhousing(at)gmail.com. ### The Neighborhood Some details and pictures will appear here soon, in shaa Allah. ## Floor Plans and Elevation The proposed apartment building will have Car Parking on the Stilt and Four Floors (Ground, First, Second and Third). Each floor will have spacious three units of 2BHK flats measuring roughly around 1200 Square Foots. Flat A is 1073 SFT, Flat B is 1207 SFT and Flat C is 1146 SFT. Each flat will have at least two Balconies. While making the architectural plan we have considered the following points: 1. Minimum 10 ft driveway space and with 2 driveways accommodating 12 to 14 cars 2. All flats are as per Vaastu though we do not believe in that 3. Front Elevation to be best in class 4. Ample Lighting and ventilation for all flats and lobby 5. Space Planning with the Openness design concept 6. Furniture Layout Planning & Anthropometric guidelines 7. Spacious Kitchen and Toilets 8. Utility Area for each flat (Common Water Closet) [Here](docs/floor-plan.pdf) is our Typical Floor Plan ## Specifications Here is the summary of specification of each flat in **Dar-e-Salaam** as given by the Architect. More information can be obtained on need basis directly from us after the site visit. Specification | Details ------------ | ------------- Structure | Framed Structure as per ISI standards with Stilt for Covered Car Parking. The structural Design will be made after proper testing of the soil. Branded Steel and Cement will be used as per the industry Standards. The depth of footing and height of plinth will be according to the structural design. Walls | External walls of 6" Solid Cement concrete Blocks in 1:6 C.M with intermediate RCC Bed and internal walls with 4" Solid block. 8" Solid block will be used for walls where electrical ducts will be laid. Flooring | Digital or Double Charge Vitrified Tiles size 2"X2" for hall, dining and bed rooms. Granite Flooring for Kitchen. Ceramic Anti Skid Tiles Flooring for Balcony and Toilets. Wall Tiles for Kitchen (2 Feet high) and Toilets for minimum 7 Feet. Kitchen Platform | Granite kitchen platform with stainless steel sink (18X24X9 inches). Glazed tiles for minimum 2 feet height. The kitchen platform will be initially mounted on Clamps and the buyers have to do wood work (modular) of their preference. Provision for Electrical Chimny, Water Purifier and Refrigerator. Doors | Main Door - Hunna Frame and Teak Wood Shutter with Melamine Polich, Godrej or Equivalent Locks. Other Doors - Hunna Wood Frames with moulded Flush door shutters with Stainless Steel self locking handles with paint finish. Electrical Work | Modular switches of Roma/GM/Million/HiFi with fire resistant wires of Wipro/Polycab/Anchor make. Provision for UPS Connection, Water purifier, Air Condition, Refrigerator, Washing Machine, in every flat. Toilets | Ceramic Tiles up to 7” ft height & size 18”x12”, Health Faucets in all toilets. Atleast one Indian Commode in every flat as per the structural plan, the position of which can not be changed later. Sanitary | Hindware or Parry ware or Hyuida make. Floor mounted Western Commodes with attached flush tank. C.P. Fittings | Jaguar or Hindware or Parryware make - mixer in every toilet, one shower. Painting | Asian Tractor Emulsion for interiors area and ACE for exteriors. All interior walls with atleast two cotes and exterior walls with one cote of Primer. Any color preference for additional cote in interior walls is buyers liability. Common Area | Granite Flooring, Wall cladding at the entrace of elevator. M.S railings for Staircase. TV and Phone Points | Individual TV & Telephone points in main hall and other rooms whereever applicable as per the Electrical design. There will be minimum one TV point, Telephone point and data cable point. Water | One Bore well & provision for Cauvery water. One underground sump for storing cauvery water and another for storing borewell water. At least three overhead tanks, syntax or Equivalent make with minimum 2000 litres capacity. Elevator | 6 passenger capacity with centre opening doors from branded companies like Johnson, Thomson, Hepzhi, Mitshubishi, Scnider or Kone. The Elevator will be with machine Room (non-MRL). Plumbing Works | All plumbing lines with CPVC and PVC pipes, Ashirwad / Supreme. All toilets properly done with water proofing. Balcony | Anti Skid Flooring and M.S Railings upto 3 Feet height. Compound and Gate | Four to Five foot wall on all three sides of the building and Gate made of MS steel on the front ## Pricing & Payment adsfasdfasdfasdf
